title: Stream: Jamie Isaac – I Will Be Cold Soon EP
body:
Two years in the making, Jamie Isaac’s debut EP, _**I Will Be Cold Soon**_, is finally available.

Featuring the Pitchfork rated _Softly Draining Seas_ (first [featured](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11038-new-jamie-isaac-softly-draining-seas/) on CitR back in September 2011, not that I’m bragging…), alongside re-recorded versions of _Can See_ and _Hardened Front_, as well as new track _I Will Be Cold Soon_, it’s a boldly atmospheric affair, and just the first whispers of a talent that’s sure to be around for many years to come. Purchase the EP [here](http://georiot.co/3ydO), and stream it below.
